bike.description: Hi-Ten frame w/ Cr-Mo TT/DT/ST, 20.5" TT, Euro BB, tig welded, formed DT/TT, externally relieved HT w/ stamped "S" logo, wrap gusset BB yoke, seat-stay mounted U-brake bosses, integrated seat collar, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: Specialized 1.6mm Hi-Ten 1-1/4" blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 2mm thick Hi-Ten steerer, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle
1-1/8" threadless
Fuse forged alloy, 50mm extension, 1 1/8" A-Head
Hi-Ten 2pc., 675mm wide, 205mm rise, 12 degree back, 3 degree up sweep
Fuse File, Kraton w/ flange
Tektro FX-330, linear spring, 15mm offset arms w/ grey soft compound pads
Tektro SBL-89, alloy two finger, 16mm cable pull
Odyssey 1/2" x 1/8" x 13t for M30 thread
Tig welded Tubular Cr-Mo for 8 spline, 175mm length
Forged alloy 36t w/ CNC cut teeth
Euro BB, steel threaded cup, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm 8 spline Cr-Mo BB spindle
Specialized low profile, 9/16", sealed cartridge bearing, alloy platform, removable pins
Fuse Double, double wall w/ eyelets
Specialized Fuse, 36h, sealed mech., mid flange, solid 14mm Cr-Mo axle
Specialized Fuse, 36h, sealed mech., mid flange, 14mm solid axle
2.0mm (14g) stainless w/ brass nipple
Specialized Rhythm Lite Sport, 20 x 2.1", 30TPI, wire bead
Specialized Rhythm Lite Sport, 20 x 2.1", 30TPI, wire bead
Specialized schraeder valve
Specialized Fuse Jump, 8mm rail, PVC bumpers front and rear
Specialized alloy, 2 bolt, no offset, 25.4mm
Cr-Mo seat pin, allen key type
Owners manual, chainguard, reflectors, 2x steel axle pegs w/ anti-spin hardware
